oai_dc:dc.dc:title: INTERCOMPARISON OF COASTAL PROFILE MODELS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hedegaard, Ida Broker
Roelvink, J.A.
Southgate, Howard
Pechon, Philippe
Nicholson, John
Hamm, Luc
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: coastal profile
model intercomparison
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The present paper briefly presents 6 different models for short term coastal profile modelling for direct incoming waves. The models have been tested against measured profile evolutions from a large wave flume. Features such as wave height distribution, cross shore current profiles and sediment transport are compared and discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 23 (1992): Proceedings of 23rd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Venice, Italy, 1992.
